channel.title: Java problems
channel.description:
i posted yesterday about a problem i had with my client, (sorry about the double post but this is now a different problem) but my client kept cutting out, i was told that this was because of windows 7, my environmental variables and java, i was told to download the latest version of java which i did, this made no difference..
when i uninstalled that version, all the java from my laptop disappered, now i cannot run my server because 'java is not recognized as an internal or external command' and nor can i uninstall anything ect, because i dont have java anymore,
what shall i do? could someone even give me the links or names of the java softwares that i need to run my laptop such as runtime, jdk? theres so many
thanks

item.title: Java problems
item.dc:creator: @owner_alex1 owner alex1
item.description:
@owner_alex1 wrote:

i posted yesterday about a problem i had with my client, (sorry about the double post but this is now a different problem) but my client kept cutting out, i was told that this was because of windows 7, my environmental variables and java, i was told to download the latest version of java which i did, this made no difference…

when i uninstalled that version, all the java from my laptop disappered, now i cannot run my server because ‘java is not recognized as an internal or external command’ and nor can i uninstall anything ect, because i dont have java anymore,

what shall i do? could someone even give me the links or names of the java softwares that i need to run my laptop such as runtime, jdk? theres so many

thanks
